summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 7%) and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 5 mbar), light levels (up 4639 lux), cloud levels (up 563 m), and rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1493 m), light levels (up 6935 lux), and rainfall (down 0.3 mm) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 563.5m lower than yesterday, 1059.3m lower than past week, 1493.4m lower than past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 860m and a peak of 3110m, averaging 1309.9m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, very clammy and humid. A few light raindrops may fall, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and periods of sunshine are expected. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
